title: The Lord Calls Samuel
summary: In 1 Samuel 3, God calls Samuel while he’s sleeping in the tabernacle. After mistaking the voice for Eli’s, Samuel learns it’s the Lord. God gives Samuel his first prophetic message: judgment is coming to Eli’s house.

faq.question: How did God first speak to Samuel?
faq.answer: He called Samuel by name during the night while he was lying near the Ark.

faq.question: What was Samuel’s first message from God?
faq.answer: That God would judge Eli’s house for the sins of his sons.
